course_title: Qualitative Methods for Research and Evaluation
class_notes: This class is for students enrolled in the BSHES program only.
course_description: This course provides a thorough introduction to qualitative research methods in public health at multiple ecological levels. Students will be introduced to relevant aspects of qualitative research and develop their critical ability to evaluate qualitative methods. Students will undertake their own mini-qualitative studies in order to apply their skills to a public health topic.
prerequisites: This class is for BSHESMPH students only.
